spec.title: Foo

rules.text: Oh no

spec.flavour: Darn

spec.title: Bar

rules.text: Sacrifice your life. Kill an NPC who you've met.

spec.flavour: "My hatred for you makes the sun rise. Without it, I am nothing." - Final Words of Fester the Limp

spec.title: Untimely Death

rules.text: Name a character not on the current map. They take 100 damage.

spec.flavour: "I wish this guy would just die before we even showed up, that'd save us a lot of time" - General Zardon

spec.title: Field Medicine

rules.passive: Run twice as fast while carrying friendly characters.
rules.active: Heal a visible character 15. They can move twice as fast for the remainder of the session.

spec.flavour: The best medicine is running far away from things which hurt you.

spec.title: Rodent Whisperer

rules.passive: You hold influence over members of Order Rodentia.
rules.active: Turn into a rodent for as long as you want.

spec.flavour: Sometimes the smallest things take up the most room in your heart

spec.title: Avian Spirit

rules.passive: You can speak to birds.
rules.active: Become a small hummingbird for as long as you want.

spec.flavour: Birds never fail to see the forest from the trees

spec.title: Swarm

rules.passive: You are constantly covered in an insect of your choice
rules.active: Pick a small animal or insect for your target to be swarmed by.

spec.flavour: The sky went dark, and all sound was drowned out by the hum of their arrival.

spec.title: Ouphe's Aura

rules.passive: Machines fear you.
rules.active: Disable a visible machine until it is repaired.

spec.flavour: Yeah I'm into tech, into smashing it up that is

spec.title: Equestrian

rules.passive: You can tame anything you can ride.
rules.active: Summon a trusty steed.

spec.flavour: Man was destined to tame the world.

spec.title: Bow Hex

rules.passive: Roll an additional d4 when performing a ranged attack.
rules.active: Deal 10 damage to a visible target.

spec.flavour: They stood on the hill for a moment, mesmerized by the dazzling light

spec.title: Sword Hex

rules.passive: Roll an additional d6 when you perform a melee attack.
rules.active: Deal 10 damage to a visible target.

spec.flavour: It didn't slash or pierce, but rather burned. The fallen glowed as though their souls were leaving their bodies.

spec.title: Slingshot

rules.passive: Gain advantage when throwing objects.
rules.active: Launch a baseball sized rock at a visible target.

spec.flavour: You want it? Here.

spec.title: Zop

rules.text: Stun an NPC for two turns

spec.flavour: Human beings are basically just big potato batteries.

spec.title: Paz

rules.passive: Everybody hates you
rules.active: Target NPC will love you from now on

spec.flavour: Nobody knew what he saw in her

spec.title: Lover Fatale

rules.passive: Attacks against characters who love you deal 25 bonus damage.
rules.active: A visible NPC develops feelings for you.

spec.flavour: "I trust her completely" - Simon the Simple

spec.title: Infamous

rules.passive: Deal 3 bonus damage when attacking characters who know your name.
rules.active: Tell a story about yourself. Any number of visible NPCs will believe this story is true.

spec.flavour: His reputation preceded him.

spec.title: Flirt

rules.text: Increases your rapport with a visible NPC

spec.flavour: If you were words on a card, you'd be some fine print.

spec.title: Charm

rules.text: Causes a visible NPC to like you.

spec.flavour: Do you like raisins? How do you feel about a date?

spec.title: Arouse

rules.text: Causes a visible NPC to become attracted to you.

spec.flavour: There’s only one thing I want to change about you, and that’s your last name.

spec.title: Seduce

rules.text: Force any NPC you can name to act on their desire for you.

spec.flavour: Here I am - Your other two wishes?

spec.title: Commune

rules.text: Speak with any living NPC, then draw another blue.

spec.flavour: How'd you get this number? I don't even own a phone!

spec.title: Seance

rules.text: Speak with any dead NPC, then draw another blue.

spec.flavour: How'd you get this number? I didn't even own a phone when I was alive!

spec.title: Apologize

rules.text: Target visible NPC can no longer feel negative emotions towards target visible character.

spec.flavour: Vewy Sowwy.

spec.title: Distract

rules.text: Force an NPC to act on their compulsion.

spec.flavour: He wanted to pursue the thief, but he couldn't stand leaving the candy wrappers on his spotless kitchen floor.

spec.title: Lie

rules.text: Target NPC will believe your next statement.

spec.flavour: "Yeah of course I did my homework" - Little Sniver

spec.title: Disguise

rules.text: Change your appearance to match that of another exactly for as long as you'd like.

spec.flavour: "I'm Revins, Sniver went into the other room to get his homework." - Little Sniver

spec.title: Revise

rules.text: Rewrite the contents of an NPC's memory.

spec.flavour: "I'm at the end of my rope. I am done with homework. I will simply erase homework from the memory of the people" - Little Sniver

spec.title: Word Warp

rules.text: Swap two words in an NPC's vocabulary. They will not be aware of the effect, which lasts for a day.

spec.flavour: "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today." - Edward the Lax

spec.title: Magic Trick

rules.text: An aura surrounds you. NPCs who fail a perception check believe this spell had the effect of your choice.

spec.flavour: "I don't know exactly what he did.. but I just don't feel.. right? Know what I mean?" - Barry the Bandit

spec.title: Polarize

rules.passive: NPCs hate you.
rules.active: Target visible NPC will love you from now on.

spec.flavour: Nobody knew what he saw in her.

spec.title: I've Had Enough

rules.text: Cast this card only during your turn. At the start of your next turn, teleport to safety and leave behind a piece of valuable loot.

spec.flavour: See you next fall!

spec.title: Attrition

rules.text: At the start of your turn during combat, return all blues you've cast this session to your hand.

spec.flavour: You've got nice moves, but you won't be able to keep up for long.

spec.title: Take it Outside

rules.text: Move any number of allied NPCs out of combat.

spec.flavour: Let's make some space- this is about to get rowdy.

spec.title: Lunge

rules.text: Move up to 5 metres in any direction.

spec.flavour: These are great for the glutes.

spec.title: Charge

rules.passive: Gain advantage when running through obstacles.
rules.active: Move up to 15 metres in any direction.

spec.flavour: What are you running from?

spec.title: Teleport

rules.text: Teleport to any visible location.

spec.flavour: If teleportation was impossible, why did they make a word for it? Answer that one, smart guy.

spec.title: Leopold's Door

rules.text: Teleport the entire party anywhere.

spec.flavour: Endless folds in spacetime reveal themselves to the worthy

spec.title: Queen's Gambit

rules.text: Move as far as you want in an unobstructed horizontal line.

spec.flavour: Checkmate

spec.title: Grapple

rules.text: Pick a visible character to be flung towards. Both take 6 damage on impact.

spec.flavour: C'mere.

spec.title: Platzfalt Step

rules.text: Teleport to any visible space. Take damage equal to the number of squares moved.

spec.flavour: Travelling is always a pain.

spec.title: Spice Rack

rules.text: Swap the flavours of two objects within your reach.

spec.flavour: Mmm, Crayons

spec.title: Ambrosia

rules.text: Summon a brick of Ambrosia. Any NPC who has tasted or smelt it before will find it irresistible.

spec.flavour: Lifelong Ambrosia addicts scuttle around gourmet kitchens like rats, hoping to find tiny scraps.

spec.title: Positivity

rules.text: A visible NPC is forced to think positive thoughts.

spec.flavour: "You see a distant obstacle, I see an upcoming opportunity" - Diggory the Myopic

spec.title: Talk it Out

rules.passive: Whenever you make an attack, you can choose whether or not it will deal damage.
rules.active: A visible character is forced to stop what they're doing and discuss their feelings with you.

spec.flavour: "I guess, in a way, I've just been trying to impress my old man this whole time" - Brutus the Bloody Impaler

spec.title: Timeout

rules.text: For one minute, NPCs will not become hostile unless they take damage.

spec.flavour: "There goes Swift Sammy, taking money out of our vault again. What a great guy." - Regis, Imminently-Unemployed Security Guard

spec.title: Change of Heart

rules.text: Name an NPC. They will dedicate their lives to promoting peace.

spec.flavour: All life is precious, even the lives of your enemies

spec.title: Rue the Day

rules.text: Name a character who has wronged you. They feel remorse for what they have done.

spec.flavour: "And that was the second time Randy forgot about my birthday" - Pete the Petty

spec.title: Shadow Strike

rules.passive: Deal double damage while out of combat.
rules.active: Disappear for as long as you remain perfectly still.

spec.flavour: Most battles are over before they've even begun

spec.title: Survival Instincts

rules.passive: Triple advantage on all d20 rolls when below 5 health.
rules.active: Summon one of the following items: a knife, 5 feet of rope, a match, or a bottle of water.

spec.flavour: The key to survival is flexibility and urgency

spec.title: Boost

rules.text: Increase the result of a roll by 1.

spec.flavour: The collective will of the people made manifest.

spec.title: Shift

rules.text: Move a metre.

spec.flavour: When speed gets in the blood, one must move to live.

spec.title: Fluster

rules.text: Decrease the result of a roll by 1.

spec.flavour: The collective will of the people made manifest.

spec.title: Force

rules.text: Push or pull a visible object slightly.

spec.flavour: Human force extends far past the limits of an earthly body.

spec.title: Bean Blast

rules.text: Blind everyone within 3 metres with bean juice.

spec.flavour: Industrial Grade

spec.title: Anvil Drop

rules.text: Summon a cast-steel anvil into existence above target character's head.

spec.flavour: meep meep

spec.title: Sheriff's Roundup

rules.text: Choose a visible article of clothing. A snake appears inside of it.

spec.flavour: "Always drink upstream from the herd" - The Sheriff

spec.title: Ancient Throwing Bola

rules.text: Throw a pair of bola around a visible target

spec.flavour: "Bolas are excellent for capturing large mammals, like my portly friend Steve"

spec.title: Rolling Cart

rules.text: Put a large object or willing NPC in your hand.

spec.flavour: Brilliant for barging, barrowing, borrowing, bearing, busing, and bumming.

spec.title: Empouched Earth

rules.text: Cast a handful of sand and pocket lint into the air before you.

spec.flavour: Good for blinding a close range target.

spec.title: Card Printer

rules.text: Choose a Blue or green in your hand. All cards in your hand become copies of that card.

spec.flavour: Fax is short for facsimile, meaning "make similar".

spec.title: Somnomalum

rules.text: Target visible character will take 25 damage the next time they rest.

spec.flavour: Sweet dreams.

spec.title: Disappear

rules.text: Target willing character ceases to exist for up to 1 hour. They return to the last spot they existed in afterwards.

spec.flavour: "Have a vision. It is the ability to see the invisible. If you can see the invisible, you can achieve the impossible." - Byron Fex, Blind Monk

spec.title: Exhaust

rules.text: Target NPC becomes tired.

spec.flavour: "Perseverance is the hard work you do after you get tired of doing the hard work you already did."  - Gregor the Delegator

spec.title: Prison

rules.text: Choose X up to 5. A boundary, impenetrable from within, is placed X metres away from you in all directions as long as you'd like

spec.flavour: "Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door." - Gredge Putley, Future Pickaxe Owner

spec.title: Porticostatic Hex

rules.text: Target a doorway. The next living creature to pass through the door remains stuck in the frame until they take damage.

spec.flavour: "You make a better door than a window" - Jimmy Paxton, Obstructed Individual

spec.title: Object Eject

rules.text: Stand atop an object. You and the object are flung in the direction of your choice until obstructed.

spec.flavour: You'd have gotten off on the wrong foot with whoever set off on the journey of a thousand steps.

spec.title: The Ultimatum

rules.text: Flip a coin in place of your next roll. Heads for a critical success, tails for a critical failure.

spec.flavour: "I will never abide by absolutes" - Leopold the Oppugnant

spec.title: Where-Ware Charm

rules.text: Learn the current location of an item you've touched in the past.

spec.flavour: At last, the location of the missing socks.

spec.title: Groundburst

rules.text: The ground shakes beneath you. All characters within 4 metres are knocked airborne.

spec.flavour: Not suitable for tectonic fault zones.

spec.title: Bashbolster

rules.text: Attacks deal double damage until you play your next card.

spec.flavour: I'm not unarmed, I've got two of them.

spec.title: Musty Musket

rules.text: Flip a coin. Heads: Deal 15 damage to visible target. Tails: Gun backfires, take 5 damage.

spec.flavour: To get you out of a tight spot, like a colonial insurrection or a duel.

spec.title: Smoke Bomb

rules.text: Choose a 4 square metre area to fill temporarily with an opaque smoke

spec.flavour: Mildly anoxic.

spec.title: Banana Peel

rules.text: Pick a point on the floor up to 2 metres away. The next NPC to walk there will fall over.

spec.flavour: Nothing like a little prop humour.

spec.title: Poltergeist

rules.text: Possess a non-magic object within 5 tiles of your body until you lose concentration.

spec.flavour: "There's something rather... lively, about this chair" - General Kudzo

spec.title: Eidolimb

rules.text: Evoke a disembodied hand to perform a simple action within 4 metres of you.

spec.flavour: Give me five!

spec.title: Espial Thread

rules.text: Choose two visible points. You will be alerted the next time an NPC walks between them.

spec.flavour: Mob hideouts are often mysteriously empty when the Cops arrive to perform arrests

spec.title: Spectreblast

rules.text: Fire a cannonball at a target of your choice.

spec.flavour: Cannonballs were designed to destroy ships and stone fortresses. The effect they have on the human body is unspeakable.

spec.title: PBJT

rules.text: Apply a sandwich to the face of a visible character.

spec.flavour: After taking a sandwich to the face from one of his men, Colonel Kudzo was forced to retire, effective immediately

spec.title: Locomotor Hex

rules.text: Choose an NPC. They are stuck in place for ten seconds.

spec.flavour: Have my legs always been this heavy?

spec.title: Rime

rules.text: Cover an object in a thin layer of ice.

spec.flavour: Whoa, chill.

spec.title: Akindle

rules.text: Burst into flames along with anyone you're touching. 3d6 damage to each of you.

spec.flavour: I'm taking you straight to hell.

spec.title: Glacial Hand

rules.text: Touch an NPC to freeze both of you. Until your hand is removed, neither of you can attack or perform actions

spec.flavour: Let's savour this moment forever.

spec.title: Pigeon Partner

rules.text: Summon a pigeon to perform a simple task

spec.flavour: He will try his best not to be distracted by breadcrumbs.

spec.title: Gloven Mitt

rules.text: Deal d6 bonus melee damage, igniting the target.

spec.flavour: "I'm about to turn your Kitchen Dream into a Kitchen Nightmare" - Diner Employee Sr.

spec.title: Blank Deed

rules.text: Become the legal owner of a building of your choice. Existing tenants will be evicted immediately.

spec.flavour: The gang battle of 2485 concluded after the mafioso purchased their fortress and had the police escort them to jail.

spec.title: Heroic Inspiration

rules.text: Name an NPC. They will be suddenly inspired to seek greatness. By next session they will be incredibly powerful.

spec.flavour: There was a light within us that few can see. One day it will shine through.

spec.title: Wing It

rules.text: Draw 2 blues. Cast both.

spec.flavour: Live by the luck of the draw.

spec.title: Brainstorm

rules.text: Draw 2 greens. Cast both.

spec.flavour: You never know what he'll pull out of thin air.

spec.title: Spark of Inspiration

rules.text: Draw 2 reds. Cast both.

spec.flavour: I've got an idea...

spec.title: Randomize

rules.text: Draw 2 golds. Cast both.

spec.flavour: I don't know what I want, but I do want a lot of it.

spec.title: Grobble

rules.text: Draw 6 greys.

spec.flavour: Oh man, I've really Grobbled this one.

spec.title: Slipshod Sorcery

rules.text: Draw 10 blues, face-up. Cast up to 8 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: What we lack in quality we've made up with quantity.

spec.title: Spectrum Dance

rules.text: Draw 5 cards of each rarity, face-up. Cast one of each rarity and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: The greatest plans begin with simple tactics.

spec.title: Imitate

rules.text: Copy the effect of the last blue cast by any character.

spec.flavour: This is how stupid you look, watch this.

spec.title: Copy

rules.text: Copy the effect of the last green cast by any character.

spec.flavour: Stop copying me. Stop copying me.

spec.title: Master Mimic

rules.text: Copy the effect of the last red cast by any character.

spec.flavour: “Through others we become ourselves.” ― Mad Dog Millson, Revered Pirate and Thief

spec.title: Reload

rules.text: Return a blue you've cast to your hand.

spec.flavour: Don't retreat, reload.

spec.title: Tactical Reload

rules.text: Return a green you've cast to your hand.

spec.flavour: Wanna see me do it again?

spec.title: Cowboy Reload

rules.text: Return a red you've cast to your hand.

spec.flavour: Cowboys only load up 5 of the 6 bullet chambers. In the 6th chamber, they leave a hundred dollar bill to pay the undertaker.

spec.title: Adlib

rules.text: Draw 3 greys.

spec.flavour: Now, what do we have here...

spec.title: Improvise

rules.text: Draw 5 blues, face-up. Cast up to 3 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: You criticize, I improvise

spec.title: Extemporize

rules.text: Draw 5 greens, face-up. Cast up to 3 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: People will forget what you said, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget when you pulled out a fish in a fistfight.

spec.title: Helter-Skelter

rules.text: Draw 5 reds, face-up. Cast up to 3 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: Say goodbye to the rails, script, chain, wall, cuff, and beaten path.

spec.title: Four-Leaf Clover

rules.text: Draw 3 greens, face-up. Cast up to 3 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: No more of this bush-league nonsense. We need some real power.

spec.title: Rabbit's Foot

rules.text: Draw 3 reds, face-up. Cast up to 3 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: I might be able to pull it off - but just this once.

spec.title: Jackpot

rules.text: Draw 3 greens, face-up. Cast 1 and discard the rest.

spec.flavour: Do you believe in miracles?

spec.title: Quick Shot

rules.text: You can use an additional ranged attack.

spec.flavour: Rebel assault rifles are equipped with manual and fully automatic firing modes.

spec.title: Empty the Clip

rules.text: You can use two additional ranged attacks. Return a Card with Blue Rarity to your hand.

spec.flavour: Rebel soldiers employ distraction devices to buy time to reload.

spec.title: Suppression Maneuver

rules.text: You can use four additional ranged attacks. Return a Card with Green Rarity to your hand.

spec.flavour: Rebel armies spare no expense when supplying their troops with ammunition.

spec.title: Bullet Rain

rules.text: Each time you cast a card until the end of the session, return one you've cast with lesser rarity to your hand.

spec.flavour: Rebel squadrons are often mistaken for entire battalions due to the sheer amount of firepower.

spec.title: Toss

rules.text: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 5 metres away.

spec.flavour: Go ahead, toss your hat in the ring.

spec.title: Throw

rules.passive: Advantage when catching.
rules.active: Throw an object accurately at a target up to 12 metres away.

spec.flavour: If you're going to throw in the towel, at least do it properly.

spec.title: Pitch

rules.passive: Advantage when catching.
rules.active: Throw an object accurately as far as you want.

spec.flavour: I want this thing gone, understand? I want to never see it again.

spec.title: Launch

rules.text: Throw an object as far as you want. It cannot be stopped.

spec.flavour: I guess in a way, we're all still chasing it.

spec.title: Spark

rules.text: Deal 3 damage to a visible character with a painful bolt of electricity

spec.flavour: A smile costs less than electricity, but gives much light

spec.title: Lightning Bolt

rules.text: Deal 4 damage and stun up to 2 visible characters.

spec.flavour: "No." - Dr. Reed, in response to a question on whether or not a human should be able to shoot lightning out of their hands.

spec.title: Fork Lightning

rules.text: Deal 6 damage and stun to up to 6 visible characters.

spec.flavour: "Ouch" - Dr. Reed and his 5 assistants.

spec.title: Elektra's Siphon

rules.text: Cause a complete blackout in a 100 kilometre radius. Draw 3 copies of Fork Lightning

spec.flavour: If your hate could be turned into electricity, it would light up the whole world.

spec.title: Ignite

rules.text: Ignite a small object within 3 metres.

spec.flavour: Including but not limited to a friend's new article of clothing, letters from their loved ones, and paper money.

spec.title: Fireball

rules.text: Hurl a flaming ball of hot embers at a visible object.

spec.flavour: Time for a game of hot potato!

spec.title: Immolate

rules.text: Deal 15 damage and set fire to all flammable objects within 6 metres.

spec.flavour: The best part is that nice campfire smell.

spec.title: Terrestrial Sun

rules.text: Summon a brick of material which burns violently forever when set on fire.

spec.flavour: The fire in our hearts will never burn out

spec.title: Jump

rules.text: Jump up 3 metres.

spec.flavour: "Alright buddy, let's calm down ok?" - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

spec.title: Leap

rules.text: Jump 25 metres into the air.

spec.flavour: "Good lord, look at him go.." - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

spec.title: Levitate

rules.text: Hover up to 2 metres off the ground until you lose concentration.

spec.flavour: "I see. He is now a boy of the air, not of the ground." - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

spec.title: Ascend

rules.text: Jump as high as you want.

spec.flavour: "I miss him everyday" - Warner Higgins, Concerned Father

spec.title: Moisten

rules.text: Pick a visible object. It becomes moist.

spec.flavour: I think I'm going to need a change of clothes.

spec.title: Soak

rules.text: Cause everything within 2 metres of a visible object to become saturated with water.

spec.flavour: My plan: complete. Their day: ruined.

spec.title: Drench

rules.text: Summon 50 thousand litres of water to a visible location.

spec.flavour: "Listen pal, I'm not afraid of getting a little wet. Go ahead and cast it" - Quomo the Quivering

spec.title: Flood

rules.text: A Tsunami breaks over the play area from a cardinal direction of your choice.

spec.flavour: Nature has a myriad of weapons to combat human arrogance.

spec.title: Hope

rules.text: Change the result of a roll by 2.

spec.flavour: I can't see him, but I know he's there.

spec.title: Pray

rules.text: Re-roll a d20.

spec.flavour: He will save us from our mortal errors.

spec.title: Preach

rules.text: Describe a religious vision. Pick a visible NPC to experience it.

spec.flavour: He lives deep in the hearts of all men.

spec.title: Wish

rules.text: Cause all players to critically succeed on their next d20 roll.

spec.flavour: The light will shine bright upon the chosen.

spec.title: Cure

rules.text: Cure the ailment of a visible character, or heal them 8.

spec.flavour: Treats an upset stomach, a broken heart, or a pierced lung

spec.title: Renew

rules.passive: You are 3 feet taller.
rules.active: Restore a visible character to maximum health. Their maximum health permanently increases by 10 and they grow 3 feet taller.

spec.flavour: "I hope you don't mind if I make some improvements while I'm in here" - Dr. Reichthardt, Orthopedic Surgeon

spec.title: Reincarnate

rules.passive: The dead fear you.
rules.active: Revive a dead character.

spec.flavour: If man is to play god, he ought to be a kind one.

spec.title: Brace

rules.text: Take no damage from the next attack targeting you.

spec.flavour: I barely felt that! Who taught you how to punch?

spec.title: Reflect

rules.passive: Thrown objects bounce off of you with equal force.
rules.active: The next amount of damage dealt to you is also dealt to your attacker.

spec.flavour: Let's see how you like it!.

spec.title: Deflect

rules.text: Any damage dealt to you from the next attack targeting you is instead dealt to your attacker

spec.flavour: I am rubber, and you are glue.

spec.title: Golan's Idol

rules.text: Name a character. They can no longer deal damage to you.

spec.flavour: "It's futile. I've already analyzed all of your moves." - 5-Year-Old Jacob, Yellow Belt

spec.title: Double Strike

rules.text: You can attack two additional times on your turn.

spec.flavour: Before they even realized what happened, another punch sent them flying.

spec.title: Quad Strike

rules.text: You can attack four additional times on your turn.

spec.flavour: Their defense won't last forever. Strike, and strike again.

spec.title: Strike Storm

rules.text: You can make twice times as many attacks as you otherwise would on your turn.

spec.flavour: Every fighter has gaps between attacks which can be exploited. Just make sure to take them after your opponent is dead.

spec.title: Endless Blows

rules.text: Take X damage. You can attack X times on your turn.

spec.flavour: Punches, kicks, and jabs stretch out before me into endless infinity, a fractal of iron striking limbs.

spec.title: Gust of Wind

rules.text: Throw a visible character up into the air.

spec.flavour: He should've worn a windbreaker.

spec.title: Gale

rules.passive: Whenever you throw a character in the air, you can also throw them 8 metres in any direction
rules.active: Throw any number of characters in a 3 metre radius into the air.

spec.flavour: You look like a birthday candle.

spec.title: Wind Storm

rules.text: Throw any number of visible characters up into the air.

spec.flavour: Rise, rise towards the heavens.

spec.title: Hurricane

rules.text: A powerful hurricane is summoned over the play area for as long as you want.

spec.flavour: It is rare for an area to know such devastation.

spec.title: Barrier

rules.text: Summon an impenetrable column of light in adjacent square metre for 5 minutes.

spec.flavour: "Quit the mime act and c'mon! We're getting out of here!" - Barry the Bandit

spec.title: Mirror Image

rules.text: Summon a copy of any NPC.

spec.flavour: "I hated the man so much I made a point of killing him twice" - R.J. Alabaster, Deranged Cardmaster
